seo.title: Garmin Dash Cam™ Tandem | Dash Camera
seo.ogDescription: Garmin Dash Cam™ Tandem is a compact dual-lens dash camera with two 180-degree lenses that record in 1440p giving you clear & complete coverage around the driver.

overviewTab.title: Overview

inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box
inTheBoxTab.content:
• Garmin Dash Cam™ Tandem
  • 16 GB microSD™ card
  • Low-profile magnetic mount
  • 4 m power cable

  • Dual USB power adapter
  • Documentation

productEmsList.tooltip:
Dash Cam Mini 3: 1080p Ultra-compact dash cam with a 140-degree field of view and built-in polariser to reduce windshield glare

Dash Cam X110: 1080p Compact dash cam with a 140-degree field of view, 2.4″ LCD display and built-in polariser to reduce windshield glare

Dash Cam X210: 1440p Compact dash cam with the same features as Dash Cam X110

Dash Cam X310: 4K Ultra HD Compact dash cam with the same features as Dash Cam X110

Dash Cam Tandem: Compact Dash Cam with two 180-degree lenses for recording inside and out

Dash Cam Live: 1440p LTE dash cam with a 140-degree field of view. LTE connectivity (subscription required) enables anytime access to live view, location tracking, theft alerts and parking guard notifications from your dash cam to the app on your smartphone.
productEmsList.title: Edition

productEmsList.tooltip: Plug into your vehicle's OBD-II port for constant power to your compatible Garmin Dash Cam, even when the vehicle is parked and turned off. Learn more
productEmsList.title: Add Constant Power
